title: Pbe, Why you lyin??
body: Every time i try to either log into my pbe or something i cant get in; is it shut down? I haven't found any real posts explaining it and i would like an answer.

replies.body: What do you mean by you can't get in?  Are you having an error accessing a specific page, or accepted to the PBE?  What url are you using?

I just cant log in. I even tried to reset my password for the email. I know the exact email and all but it is like saying the email is still incorrect when i log in. It wont let me reset my password and it wont let me log in.

That's strange, but don't worry we'd like to help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account recovery team can help recover your account.  We'll get back to you!
i tried resetting my pass and things; my brothers account doesnt work either. Was our ip banned for some reason? Or is this a glitch or what... I would like to know.
